majorCode.label: Major Code
majorCode.description: Machine readable identifier for the major. This value is unlikely to have meaning outside of a specific institution.

type.label: Type
type.description: The type of the telephone number.

url.description: Describes the url for a person.

verified.label: Verified
verified.description: True if the telephone number has been verified.

type.label: Type
type.description: The type of the telephone number.

number.label: Number
number.description: Telephone number for the person, preferably in + notation.

type.label: Type
type.description: The type of the photo (not the encoding).

encoding.label: Encoding
encoding.description: The encoding used for the photo.

data.label: Data
data.description: Encoding of a photo of the person.

photo.description: Describes a photo, including its data, type, and encoding.

suffix.label: Suffix
suffix.description: The honorific suffix of the person's name, such as "Jr" or "III".

prefix.label: Prefix
prefix.description: The honorific prefix of the person's name, such as "Dr" or "Ms".

middle.label: Middle
middle.description: The component of the person's name excluding the given, family, and honorific components.

language.label: Language
language.description: The language encoding of the person's name.

given.label: Given
given.description: The component of the person's name excluding the middle, family, and honorific components.

formatted.label: Formatted
formatted.description: The person's name, suitably formatted for display.

family.label: Family
family.description: The component of the person's name excluding the given, middle, and honorific components.

meta.description: Any complex attribute (Person, Person Role, Address, Identifier, etc) may optionally have the following meta attributes.

fullName.label: Full Name
fullName.description: Full name, as confirmed on document.

documentType.label: Document Type
documentType.description: Type of document used to confirm identity.

documentIssuer.label: Document Issuer
documentIssuer.description: Name of agency issuing the confirmation document.

dateOfBirth.label: Date of Birth
dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth, as confirmed on document.

identityProof.description: Describes the proof of an identity.

verified.label: Verified
verified.description: True if the address has been verified.

type.label: Type
type.description: The type of the email address.

verified.label: Verified
verified.description: True if the address has been verified.

street.label: Street
street.description: Street/site information from a postal address (street name, house number, etc).

room.label: Room
room.description: Room information from a postal address.

region.label: Region
region.description: Region information from a postal address (state, province, etc).

postalCode.label: Postal Code
postalCode.description: Postal code from a postal address.

locality.label: Locality
locality.description: Locality information from a postal address (city, etc).

language.label: Language
language.description: The language encoding of the address.

formatted.label: Formatted
formatted.description: Address rendered as a single string, possibly with embedded newlines.

address.description: Describes the address information associated with an identity.

campus.description: The campus location this role is attached to, as defined by the institution.
campus.label: Campus

campusCode.description: Machine readable identifier for a campus. This value is unlikely to have meaning outside of a specific institution.
campusCode.label: Campus Code

department.description: The name of the department the role is attached to (multiple values are permitted if multiple departments sponsor a single role).
department.label: Department

departmentCode.description: Machine readable identifier for a department. This value is unlikely to have meaning outside of a specific institution.
departmentCode.label: Department Code

displayTitle.description: The display title for this role.
displayTitle.label: Display Title

leaveBegins.description: Time at which leave from this role begins; advisory - status is controlling.
leaveBegins.label: Leave Begins

leaveEnds.description: Time after which leave fropm this role is no longer in effect; advisory - status is controlling.
leaveEnds.label: Leave Ends

manager.description: The identifier (preferably of time enterprise) describing the manager for this role.
manager.label: Manager

organization.description: The name of the organization/institution the role is attached to (multiple values are permitted if multiple organizations sponsor a single role).
organization.label: Organization

organizationCode.description: Machine readable identifier for an organization.  This value is unlikely to have meaning outside of a specific institution.
organizationCode.label: Organization Code

percentTime.description: The percentage time for this role (100 = full time).
percentTime.label: Percent Time

rank.description: The rank of this role relative to all roles from all SORs (highest rank = 1).
rank.label: Rank

rankSor.description: The rank of this role relative to only roles from this SOR (highest rank = 1).
rankSor.label: Rank SOR

roleBegins.description: Time at which the role officially begins.
roleBegins.label: Role Begins

roleEnds.description: Time after which the role is officially no longer in effect.
roleEnds.label: Role Ends

sor.description: Label for the system of record asserting this role.
sor.label: SOR Label

terminationReason.description: Reason for termination associated with this role.

title.description: The official title for this role.

term.description: Term for which this record applies.

classYear.label: Class Year
